name: employmentYearsCheck
description: Employment stability check for credit limit determination
content:
rule employmentYearsCheck:
    if applicant.employmentYears >= 2 then approveApplication
    if applicant.employmentYears < 1 then rejectApplication
    if applicant.employmentYears >= 1 and applicant.employmentYears < 2 then conditionalApproval
